summary:
Simple retexture I made for the Vampire royal armour, I made this for myself to fit nicely with shodan44's Black and Gold Elven/Thalmor equipment
( https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6524 )
descriptionHtml:
first mod/retexture I've ever made, thought I might as well share in case anybody else wants it, it's only currently for Males ( though I guess if there was some kind of demand for a female variant I could probably manage it (hence v0.1 it is very bare minimum as is).

Drop a message if there are any issues, though I havent encountered any during my usage.
author: KTI
